description: LOCAL GOVERNMENT STRENGTHENING AND INVESTMENT PROGRAMME

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: LOGSIP has three components: a) Policy and regulatory framework; b) Institutional/Capacity development ; c) Investments and service delivery. The project aims to: a) To contribute towards the operationalisation of the second phase of the National Decentralisation Programme (NDP II); b) To enhance the capacity and effectiveness of all institutions directly implementing NDP II; c) To enhance the capacity of local authorities and their communities in the planning, promotion, and management of LED.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: LOGSIP
